body_html:
There is some logic in the constant folder which treats int32 ops differently when assigned to non-CPU devices. This can be a pain when adding new device types and should probably be improved.

We should also probably take a look at the interaction of constant folding (and other optimizations) with the the two graph partitioning stages.
body_text:

We should also probably take a look at the interaction of constant folding (and other optimizations) with the the two graph partitioning stages.
body:
There is some logic in the constant folder which treats int32 ops differently when assigned to non-CPU devices.  This can be a pain when adding new device types and should probably be improved.

We should also probably take a look at the interaction of constant folding (and other optimizations) with the the two graph partitioning stages.
